properties.name: Name
properties.help: IoT Hub name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location of your IoT Hub. Default is the location of target resource group.

properties.name: PartitionCount
properties.help: The number of partitions for device-to-cloud messages.

properties.name: Sku
properties.help: Pricing tier for Azure IoT Hub. Default value is F1, which is free. Note that only one free IoT hub instance is allowed in each subscription. Exception will be thrown if free instances exceed one.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: OutputDir
properties.help: Output directory for generated self-signed X.509 certificate. Default is current working directory.

properties.name: PrimaryThumbprint
properties.help: Primary X.509 certificate thumbprint to authenticate device.

properties.name: SecondaryThumbprint
properties.help: Secondary X.509 certificate thumbprint to authenticate device.

properties.name: ValidDays
properties.help: Number of days the generated self-signed X.509 certificate should be valid for. Default validity is 365 days.

properties.name: X509
properties.help: Use X.509 certificate for device authentication.

properties.name: DeviceId
properties.help: Device Id.

properties.name: HubName
properties.help: IoT Hub name.

properties.name: Etag
properties.help: ETag of the target device. It is used for the purpose of optimistic concurrency. Delete operation will be performed only if the specified ETag matches the value maintained by the server, indicating that the device identity has not been modified since it was retrieved. Default value is set to wildcard character (*) to force an unconditional delete.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: BlobContainerUri
properties.help: Blob Shared Access Signature URI with write access to a blob container.This is used to output the status of the job and the results.

properties.name: IncludeKeys
properties.help: If set, keys are exported normally. Otherwise, keys are set to null in export output.

properties.name: InputBlobContainerUri
properties.help: Blob Shared Access Signature URI with read access to a blob container.This blob contains the operations to be performed on the identity registry.

properties.name: OutputBlobContainerUri
properties.help: Blob Shared Access Signature URI with write access to a blob container.This is used to output the status of the job and the results.
